MUJEER

MUJEER
APPL
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME)

MUJEER needs Bluetooth access to connect to business devices such as barcode scanners, printers, and other peripheral devices.
MUJEER needs Bluetooth access to communicate with business peripherals and devices for enhanced MUJEER functionality.
MUJEER needs calendar access to schedule meetings, track appointments, and manage business events within your MUJEER workflow.
MUJEER needs camera access to scan barcodes, QR codes, and capture business documents. This helps you quickly input data and manage inventory.
MUJEER needs access to your contacts to help you quickly select and manage business contacts, import customer information, and streamline communication workflows in your MUJEER system.
MUJEER needs access to documents to import and export business files, reports, and data for your MUJEER operations.
MUJEER uses Face ID to provide secure and convenient access to your business data and sensitive MUJEER information.
MUJEER needs access to your local network to connect to local servers, printers, and other business devices on your network.
MUJEER needs location access to provide comprehensive location-based business services including background location tracking for work hours and automated location-based check-ins.
MUJEER needs location access to provide location-based features such as tracking work locations, finding nearby offices, and location-based time tracking for business operations.
MUJEER may need microphone access for voice notes, audio recording of meetings, and voice-to-text features to enhance your business productivity.
MUJEER needs motion access to track work-related activities and provide insights into your business productivity patterns.
MUJEER needs permission to save screenshots, business documents, reports, and images to your photo library for easy access and sharing of important business information.
MUJEER needs access to your photo library to save and manage business documents, screenshots, reports, and images. This allows you to organize and share important business information.
MUJEER needs access to reminders to help you manage tasks, deadlines, and business reminders integrated with your MUJEER system.
MUJEER needs speech recognition access to provide voice-to-text features for faster data entry and voice commands in your business workflow.
MUJEER would like to track your activity across other companies' apps and websites to provide better analytics and improve your business experience.
